item.title: What Types of Eczema is Tallow Balm Best For?
item.description: What Types of Eczema is Tallow Balm Best For? Not all eczema is the same. Some types cause dry, cracked skin, while others result in red, itchy patches or fluid-filled blisters. Tallow balm NZ is a deeply hydrating, soothing option that helps with multiple forms of eczema. 1. Atopic Dermatitis (Chronic Eczema) ✔ Hydrates deep into the skin → Prevents chronic dryness. ✔ Supports the skin barrier → Reduces flare-up frequency.
